text: Ara surya yakhana udaya hata takhana tumi dekhate pete tadera guha theke dana dike hele ache, ara yakhana asta yeta takhana bama pasa diye tadera atikrama karache, ara tara era eka bistrta ancala jure rayechila. Eti chila allahâ€Œra nidarsanagulora an'yatama. Yake allah satpathe calana se'i tabe satpathe calita, ara yake tini pathabhrasta hate dena tara jan'ye tumi tabe kono patha pradarsanakari abhibhabaka pabe na.
